name: start_after_end.deployment_datetime
label: 'deployment_datetime' cannot be after 'recovery_datetime'
rule: is.na(deployment_datetime) | is.na(recovery_datetime) | lubridate::ymd_hms(deployment_datetime, quiet = TRUE) <= lubridate::ymd_hms(recovery_datetime, quiet = TRUE)

name: usable_before_start.recording_usable_start_datetime
label: 'recording_usable_start_datetime' cannot be after 'recording_start_datetime'
rule: is.na(recording_usable_start_datetime) | is.na(recording_start_datetime) | lubridate::ymd_hms(recording_usable_start_datetime, quiet = TRUE) >= lubridate::ymd_hms(recording_start_datetime, quiet = TRUE)

name: usable_after_end.recording_usable_end_datetime
label: 'recording_usable_end_datetime' cannot be after 'recording_end_datetime'
rule: is.na(recording_usable_end_datetime) | is.na(recording_end_datetime) | lubridate::ymd_hms(recording_usable_end_datetime, quiet = TRUE) <= lubridate::ymd_hms(recording_end_datetime, quiet = TRUE)
